no_saved_addresses_subtitle: Add your home, work or favourite spots
faq_booking_q1: How do I book a ride in advance?
faq_booking_a1: Open the app, tap "Schedule a Ride", select your pickup and destination, then choose a future date and time. You'll receive a reminder 30 minutes before your ride.
faq_booking_q2: Can I modify my reservation after booking?
faq_booking_a2: Yes. Go to "My Trips" > select the upcoming ride > tap "Edit". You can change the time, destination, or vehicle type up to 15 minutes before pickup.
faq_booking_q3: How far in advance can I schedule a ride?
faq_booking_a3: You can schedule rides up to 7 days ahead. For airport transfers we recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to guarantee availability.
faq_payments_q1: How do I request a refund for a cancelled ride?
faq_payments_a1: Go to "My Trips", find the cancelled ride, and tap "Request Refund". Refunds are processed within 3–5 business days to your original payment method.
faq_payments_q2: How do I update my primary payment method?
faq_payments_a2: Go to Profile > Payment Methods > tap "+" to add a new card or PayPal. Tap the method and select "Set as Default". Remove old methods by swiping left.
faq_payments_q3: Why was I charged more than the estimated fare?
faq_payments_a3: Final fares can differ due to route changes, traffic, tolls, or surge pricing. The full breakdown is always shown in your trip receipt right after the ride.
faq_account_q1: How do I change my password?
faq_account_a1: Go to Profile > Settings > Security > "Change Password". Enter your current password then your new one twice. You'll be signed out of other devices automatically.
faq_account_q2: What should I do if my account is compromised?
faq_account_a2: Tap "Report Compromised Account" in Settings > Security, or call our 24/7 support line. We'll lock your account and guide you through a secure recovery process.
faq_account_q3: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
faq_account_a3: Go to Profile > Settings > Security > "Two-Factor Authentication" and toggle it on. Choose SMS or an authenticator app — we strongly recommend enabling 2FA.
